Text: In related news, CEO John W. Robinson sold 15,000 shares of the stock in a transaction that occurred on Tuesday, July 30th. The shares were sold at an average price of $62.09, for a total transaction of $931,350.00. Following the completion of the sale, the chief executive officer now owns 295,933 shares of the company's stock, valued at $18,374,479.97.
